self.name: messages.sendEncryptedService
self.description: Sends a service message to a secret chat.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Sends a service message to a secret chat.

arguments.name: randomId
arguments.description: Unique client message ID required to prevent message resending

arguments.name: data
arguments.description: TL-serialization of DecryptedMessage type, encrypted with a key generated during chat initialization

throws.description: The provided secret chat ID is invalid
throws.name: ENCRYPTION_ID_INVALID

throws.description: A waiting call returned an error
throws.name: MSG_WAIT_FAILED

throws.description: You were blocked by this user
throws.name: USER_IS_BLOCKED
